page.title: 09INDUSTRIAL ESTATES
page.content: {Purdey's Way Industrial Estate ------------------------------ Along the Sutton Rd. a short distance from the Anne Boleyn roundabout is Purdey's Way Industrial Estate.This comprises of firms involved in the manufacturing, wholesale and retail industries. There are three major "Home Improvement" stores on the estate which are open seven days a week. These stores; MFI-retailer of furniture,TEXAS HOMECARE-sells DIY materials and QUEENSWAY-furniture and carpets,are aimed at the domestic consumer.
